titles.title: Federal Aviation Administration Veterans' Preference Protection Act
A bill to apply the provisions of title 5, United States Code, related to veterans' preference to the Federal Aviation Administration personnel management system, and for other purposes.
Federal Aviation Administration Veterans' Preference Protection Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Federal Aviation Administration Veterans' Preference Protection Act
This bill applies federal veterans' preference provisions for filling a position in the competitive service and remedies for violations of such provisions to the personnel management system of the Federal Aviation Administration.
